name: Fractal Chaos
description:
You're an orc trying to destroy the human villages, but there is one little problem. The villages are protected by magic towers made by "The Wizard". You have to get to the villages before the magic walls appear.

Game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Inspired by the mathematical chaos game

This is my first published game and my first time participating in a Game Jam so the game is very short and doesn't have much in terms of gameplay or game mechanics, but I would love to get suggestions to what I could do better.

Credits:
  • Scripting and graphics: Filip "Disnejar" Orlowski
  • Lightning assets: sanctumpixel
  • Music: Adventure, Blacksmith, Hearthbeat, Hymn to the gods, Wonderland by Alexander Nakarada
  • Fire and button SFX: Mixkit
  • Footstep SFX: TinyWorlds
